程序包 net.minecraftforge.fml.relauncher

类 ReflectionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.fml.relauncher.ReflectionHelper
  • @Deprecated
public class ReflectionHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    已过时。
    not for external use
    Some reflection helper code. This is in FML's coremod land. It's split in two because the two classes need to exist in separate classloaders. Modders shouldn't be using this class anyways. Use ObfuscationReflectionHelper when dealing with obfuscated fields or methods.
    作者:
    cpw

    • 方法详细资料

      • findField

        @Deprecated
public static java.lang.reflect.Field findField​(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                                java.lang.String... fieldNames)
        已过时。
        use findField(Class, String, String)

      • findField

        @Nonnull
public static java.lang.reflect.Field findField​(@Nonnull
                                                java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                                @Nonnull
                                                java.lang.String fieldName,
                                                @Nullable
                                                java.lang.String fieldObfName)
        已过时。
        Finds a field with the specified name in the given class and makes it accessible. Note: for performance, store the returned value and avoid calling this repeatedly.

        Throws an exception if the field is not found.

        参数:
        clazz - The class to find the field on.
        fieldName - The name of the field to find (used in developer environments, i.e. "maxStackSize").
        fieldObfName - The obfuscated name of the field to find (used in obfuscated environments, i.e. "field_77777_bU"). If the name you are looking for is on a class that is never obfuscated, this should be null.
        返回:
        The field with the specified name in the given class.

      • findMethod

        @Nonnull
public static java.lang.reflect.Method findMethod​(@Nonnull
                                                  java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                                  @Nonnull
                                                  java.lang.String methodName,
                                                  @Nullable
                                                  java.lang.String methodObfName,
                                                  java.lang.Class<?>... parameterTypes)
        已过时。
        Finds a method with the specified name and parameters in the given class and makes it accessible. Note: for performance, store the returned value and avoid calling this repeatedly.

        Throws an exception if the method is not found.

        参数:
        clazz - The class to find the method on.
        methodName - The name of the method to find (used in developer environments, i.e. "getWorldTime").
        methodObfName - The obfuscated name of the method to find (used in obfuscated environments, i.e. "func_72820_D"). If the name you are looking for is on a class that is never obfuscated, this should be null.
        parameterTypes - The parameter types of the method to find.
        返回:
        The method with the specified name and parameters in the given class.

      • findConstructor

        @Nonnull
public static <T> java.lang.reflect.Constructor<T> findConstructor​(@Nonnull
                                                                   java.lang.Class<T> klass,
                                                                   @Nonnull
                                                                   java.lang.Class<?>... parameterTypes)
        已过时。
        Finds a constructor in the specified class that has matching parameter types.
        类型参数:
        T - The type
        参数:
        klass - The class to find the constructor in
        parameterTypes - The parameter types of the constructor.
        返回:
        The constructor
        抛出:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if klass is null
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if parameterTypes is null
        ReflectionHelper.UnknownConstructorException - if the constructor could not be found
